about.title: Every Face Can Make a Bang if You Know How to Cut it
about.paragraph1: Mighty is my attempt at using Eleventy to build a sort of Single Page Application (SPA) - a simple, elegant theme from which freelancers or small businesses can generate simple one-pagers. This is a demo of the project, featuring a fake hair salon in London. To install, customize, and adapt the theme to your needs, please see the README file on GitHub.
about.paragraph2: And now, some Cheese Lorem Ipsum for your enjoyment: Manchego babybel parmesan. Cheese slices lancashire cow cheese strings jarlsberg cheese and wine lancashire bavarian bergkase. Cheese slices babybel gouda manchego everyone loves pecorino taleggio melted cheese. Swiss.
